arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs AZ Alkmaar – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are searching for their first-ever European home win on Thursday as they host Dutch side AZ Alkmaar in a pivotal UEFA Conference League match. Both teams enter the game at Selhurst Park level on three points in the league stage standings. Consequently, this game is crucial for their qualification hopes.
